amendment.description: An amendment numbered 32 printed in House Report 119-232 to strike all funding for the Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike all funding for the Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 297 (Roll no. 236).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 297 (Roll no. 236).
